entry.para: If no timezone information is specified, all values will be assumed to be in the local timezone of the processing system.
If no timezone information is specified, all values will be assumed to be in the local timezone of the processing system.
If no timezone information is specified, all values will be assumed to be in the local timezone of the processing system.

sect1.title: Authentication
sect1.para: With the exception of the CreateTicket command, all commands in this API must be authenticated by one of the following two methods:

row.entry: 40 character ticket code, obtained from a previous CreateTicket call.

sect1.title: Result Reporting
sect1.para: Commands that return an error or do not return specialized data types (e.g. audio data for the Export command) will return an XML document describing the result of the command, in the following format:

listitem.para: The HTTP result code, as defined in RFC2616
A text string describing the result, suitable for displaying in a UI
An extended error code from the audio converter routines. These values are defined in the RDAudioConvert::ErrorCode enumeration in lib/rdaudioconvert.h. This parameter is optional.

sect1.title: AddCart
sect1.subtitle: Add a new cart
sect1.para: A 403 error will be returned if the requested cart number is not within the configured range for the specified group and 'Enforce Cart Range' is set in RDAdmin->ManageGroups.

row.entry: Optional, default is to use next available cart number for specified group

sect1.title: AddCut
sect1.subtitle: Add a new cut to an existing cart
sect1.para: A 404 error will be returned if the requested cart number is not authorized for the specified Rivendell user in RDAdmin->ManageUsers->AssignGroupPerms.

sect1.title: AddLog
sect1.subtitle: Add a new log

row.entry: Name of log to be created.
Name of the service to own the new log.

sect1.title: AssignSchedCode
sect1.subtitle: Assign a scheduler code to an existing cart
sect1.para: A 404 error will be returned if the specified cart number is not authorized for the specified Rivendell user in RDAdmin->ManageUsers->AssignGroupPerms.

sect1.title: AudioInfo
sect1.subtitle: Get information about an entry in the audio store

sect1.title: AudioStore
sect1.subtitle: Get information about the audio store

sect1.title: CreateTicket
sect1.subtitle: Create an authorization ticket for a given user/client IP address

sect1.title: DeleteAudio
sect1.subtitle: Delete PCM/MPEG data from the audio store

sect1.title: DeleteLog
sect1.subtitle: Delete a log

row.entry: Name of log to be deleted.

sect1.title: DeletePodcast
sect1.subtitle: Delete posted podcast audio from the audio store
sect1.para: Required User Permissions: Delete Podcast, Feed Permission or Administer System
A 404 error will be returned if the requested podcast's parent feed is not authorized for the specified Rivendell user in RDAdmin->ManageUsers->PodcastFeedPermissions.

sect1.title: EditCart
sect1.subtitle: Write metadata changes for an existing cart into the database
sect1.para: A 404 error will be returned if the requested cart belongs to a group that is not authorized for the specified Rivendell user in RDAdmin->ManageUsers->AssignGroupPerms, or if it is attempted to assign the cart to such a group.
A 409 error will be returned if the requested cart's number falls outside the valid range for the requested GROUP_NAME.
If the tags for an 'optional' field are omitted, then the respective parameter on the target cart will be left unchanged.

row.entry: Include cut data in return, 0 = no, 1 = yes

sect1.title: EditCut
sect1.subtitle: Write metadata changes for an existing cut into the database
sect1.para:
A 404 error will be returned if the requested cart belongs to a group that is not authorized for the specified Rivendell user in RDAdmin->ManageUsers->AssignGroupPerms.
If the tags for an 'optional' field are omitted, then the respective parameter on the target cart will be left unchanged.

row.entry: Set the Evergreen Falg, valid values are 0 = no, 1 = yes
Optional, RFC-822 or XML xs:dateTime format
Optional, RFC-822 or XML xs:dateTime format
Optional, mS from absolute start of audio data
Optional, mS from absolute start of audio data
Optional, mS from absolute start of audio data
Optional, mS from absolute start of audio data
Optional, mS from absolute start of audio data
Optional, mS from absolute start of audio data
Optional, mS from absolute start of audio data
Optional, mS from absolute start of audio data
Optional, mS from absolute start of audio data
Optional, mS from absolute start of audio data

sect1.title: Export
sect1.subtitle: Export audio data from the audio store

row.entry: Mandatory, 0 = PCM16 WAV, 2 = MPEG L2 native, 3 = MPEG L3 native, 4 = FLAC, 5 = OggVorbis, 6 = MPEG L2 WAV, 7 = PCM24 WAV
Mandatory, set to '0' for PCM or VBR
Mandatory, used only by OggVorbis, set to '0' for others
Mandatory, mS from absolute start of stored audio
Mandatory, mS from absolute start of stored audio

sect1.title: ExportPeaks
sect1.subtitle: Export audio peak data from the audio store
sect1.para: A 404 error will be returned if the requested cart is not authorized for the specified Rivendell user in RDAdmin->ManageUsers->AssignGroupPerms.

sect1.title: GetPodcast
sect1.subtitle: Get posted podcast audio
sect1.para: Command Code: RDXPORT_COMMAND_GET_PODCAST, Feed Permissions or Administer System
Required User Permissions: Edit Podcast, Feed Permission
A 404 error will be returned if the requested podcast's parent feed is not authorized for the specified Rivendell user in RDAdmin->ManageUsers->PodcastFeedPermissions.

sect1.title: Import
sect1.subtitle: Import audio data into the audio store
sect1.para: A 404 error will be returned if the requested cart is not authorized for the specified Rivendell user in RDAdmin->ManageUsers->AssignGroupPerms or if the system is configured to require unique titles and a non-unique title is provided in the TITLE field.
NOTE: The method must be called with 'multipart/form-data' encoding.

If the CREATE field is set to '1', a valid GROUP_NAME specified and both CART_NUMBER and CUT_NUMBER fields are set to zero, the system will attempt to create a new cart/cut in the specified group. If successful, the cart and cut numbers will be returned as part of the RDWebResult return.

row.entry: Create cart/cut if it does not exist
Add newly created cart/cut to specified group.
The TITLE value for the imported audio. This will override any value found in in-file metadata.

sect1.title: ListCart
sect1.subtitle: Return information about a specified cart
sect1.para: A 404 error will be returned if the requested cart belongs to a group that is not authorized for the specified Rivendell user in RDAdmin->ManageUsers->AssignGroupPerms.

sect1.title: ListCarts
sect1.subtitle: Return information about a set of carts
sect1.para: Only those carts that belong to groups authorized for the specified Rivendell user in RDAdmin->ManageUsers->AssignGroupPerms will be returned.

row.entry: Limit returns to members of specified group
Optional, default is to search all available carts
Limit returns to carts containing specified space-separated keyword(s)
Optional, default is to apply no filtering
Limit returns to carts of the specified type

sect1.title: ListCartSchedCodes
sect1.subtitle: Return information about all scheduler codes assigned to a cart
sect1.para: A 404 error will be returned if the requested cart belongs to a group that is not authorized for the specified Rivendell user in RDAdmin->ManageUsers->AssignGroupPerms.

sect1.title: ListCut
sect1.subtitle: Return information about a specified cut
sect1.para: A 404 error will be returned if the requested cart belongs to a group that is not authorized for the specified Rivendell user in RDAdmin->ManageUsers->AssignGroupPerms.

sect1.title: ListCuts
sect1.subtitle: Return information about all cuts belonging to a cart
sect1.para: A 404 error will be returned if the requested cart belongs to a group that is not authorized for the specified Rivendell user in RDAdmin->ManageUsers->AssignGroupPerms.

sect1.title: ListGroup
sect1.subtitle: Return information about a specified group
sect1.para: A 404 error will be returned if the requested group is not authorized for the specified Rivendell user in RDAdmin->ManageUsers->AssignGroupPerms.

sect1.title: ListGroups
sect1.subtitle: Return information about all available groups
sect1.para: The set of returned groups will be tailored according to what the specified Rivendell user is authorized to see in RDAdmin->ManageUsers->AssignGroupPerms.

sect1.title: ListLog
sect1.subtitle: Return a listing of the specified log

sect1.title: ListLogs
sect1.subtitle: Return information about one or more logs

row.entry: Limit returns to logs that are owned by specified service
Optional. Default is to return all logs.
Return the log with this name.
Optional. Default is to return all logs.
Limit returns to logs that contain one or more voicetrack slots
Optional, valid values 0=no, 1=yes. Default is to return all logs.
Limit returns to logs that contain the specified string in the Name, Description or Service fields.
Optional. Default is to return all logs.
Limit returns to the 14 most recently created logs.
Optional, valid values 0=no, 1=yes. Default is to return all logs.

sect1.title: ListSchedulerCodes
sect1.subtitle: Return information about all available scheduler codes

sect1.title: ListServices
sect1.subtitle: Return information about all available services

row.entry: Limits returns to services that have a valid voicetracking configuration
Optional, valid values 0=no, 1=yes. Default is to return all services

sect1.title: ListSystemSettings
sect1.subtitle: Return information about system-wide settings

sect1.title: LockLog
sect1.subtitle: Set / Update / Clear a log lock

row.entry: Opaque GUID string, returned by the CREATE operation.
Mandatory. For CREATE, send an empty string.

sect1.title: PostImage
sect1.subtitle: Upload a podcast image to the remote archive

sect1.title: PostPodcast
sect1.subtitle: Upload podcast audio from the audio store to the remote archive
sect1.para: Required User Permissions: Add Podcast, Feed Permission or Administer System
A 404 error will be returned if the requested podcast's parent feed is not authorized for the specified Rivendell user in RDAdmin->ManageUsers->PodcastFeedPermissions.

sect1.title: PostRss
sect1.subtitle: Upload podcast RSS XML to the remote archive
sect1.para: Required User Permissions: Edit Podcast, Feed Permission or Administer System
A 404 error will be returned if the requested feed is not authorized for the specified Rivendell user in RDAdmin->ManageUsers->PodcastFeedPermissions.

sect1.title: Rehash
sect1.subtitle: Generate a SHA-1 hash for a cut and write it to the database

sect1.title: RemoveCart
sect1.subtitle: Remove a cart from the Library

sect1.title: RemoveCut
sect1.subtitle: Remove an existing cut from a cart

sect1.title: RemoveImage
sect1.subtitle: Remove a podcast image from the remote archive

sect1.title: RemovePodcast
sect1.subtitle: Delete podcast audio from the remote archive
sect1.para: Required User Permissions: Delete Podcast, Feed Permission or Administer System
A 404 error will be returned if the requested podcast's parent feed is not authorized for the specified Rivendell user in RDAdmin->ManageUsers->PodcastFeedPermissions.

sect1.title: RemoveRss
sect1.subtitle: Remove podcast RSS XML from the remote archive
sect1.para: Required User Permissions: Delete Podcast, Feed Permission or Administer System
A 404 error will be returned if the requested feed is not authorized for the specified Rivendell user in RDAdmin->ManageUsers->PodcastFeedPermissions.

sect1.title: SaveFile
sect1.subtitle: Write a specified file to the '/tmp' directory. (Test only)
sect1.para: NOTE: The method must be called with 'multipart/form-data' encoding.

sect1.title: SaveLog
sect1.subtitle: Save a log to the Rivendell Database

row.entry: Save the log to this name. If it does not already exist, it will be created.
The name of the Service to which the log belongs.
The GUID string, obtained from the LockLog API call.
Optional. If not provided, the service will attempt to acquire a lock before processing the save.
The date on which the log should be automatically deleted.
The number of log line entries in this call.

Mandatory. One of the following key words:
Audio Chain Macro Marker Track MusicLink TrafficLink
Cart number for Audio or Macro events.
Mandatory. Positive integer in the range 0 - 999999.
Mandatory. Integer, expressing milliseconds past midnight.

Mandatory. One of the following key words:
Hard Relative

Mandatory. One of the following key words:
Play Segue Stop
Mandatory. Positive integer, or -1 if not defined.
Mandatory. Positive integer, or -1 if not defined.
Segue start point for one-off (voice-tracked) play-outs.
Mandatory. Positive integer, or -1 if not defined.
Segue end point for one-off (voice-tracked) play-outs.
Mandatory. Positive integer, or -1 if not defined.
Mandatory. Positive integer, or -1 if not defined.
Mandatory. Positive integer, or -1 if not defined.
Duck Up level for one-off (voice-tracked) play-outs.
Mandatory. Negative integer, or 0 if not defined.
Duck Down level for one-off (voice-tracked) play-outs.
Mandatory. Negative integer, or 0 if not defined.
Marker and Track event body text.
Marker and Track event label text.
Link event start time, in mS past midnight.
Link event start slop, in mS.
Link event end slop, in mS.

sect1.title: SavePodcast
sect1.subtitle: Save posted podcast audio
sect1.para: Required User Permissions: Create Podcast, Feed Permission or Administer System
A 404 error will be returned if the requested podcast's parent feed is not authorized for the specified Rivendell user in RDAdmin->ManageUsers->PodcastFeedPermissions.
NOTE: The method must be called with 'multipart/form-data' encoding.

sect1.title: SaveString
sect1.subtitle: Write a specified string to the syslog. (Test only)

sect1.title: TrimAudio
sect1.subtitle: Return a time pointer to the first or last instance of a particular level in a cut.
sect1.para: A 404 error will be returned if the requested cart is not authorized for the specified Rivendell user in RDAdmin->ManageUsers->AssignGroupPerms.

row.entry: Level in 1/100 dB, relative to Rivendell reference level (-16 dBFS)

sect1.title: UnassignSchedCode
sect1.subtitle: Unassign a scheduler code from an existing cart
sect1.para: A 404 error will be returned if the specified cart number is not authorized for the specified Rivendell user in RDAdmin->ManageUsers->AssignGroupPerms.
